welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Antonio de los Banos
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Antonio de los Banos, Cuba! Immerse yourself in the charming atmosphere of our city, known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the wonders our city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jose Marti International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Jose Marti International Airport, mainly used for charter and cargo flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Jose Marti International Airport, dedicated to international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but the connection may be slow and unreliable.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.
